Complete Guide

Private Equity Recruiting

Navigate on-cycle chaos, build headhunter relationships, and crush PE interviews. Everything you need to break into private equity in 2026.

Get the PE PlaybookView Timeline

On-cycle PE recruiting moves fast. You can go from first call to signed offer in under 72 hours.

On-Cycle vs. Off-Cycle Recruiting

Private equity recruiting operates on two tracks: on-cycle (the main recruiting push that happens increasingly early) and off-cycle (opportunistic hiring throughout the year). Understanding the difference is critical to your strategy.

On-Cycle

  • Starts 6-18 months before start date
  • Highly compressed timeline (days, not weeks)
  • Mega-funds and upper-middle-market
  • Headhunter-driven process

Off-Cycle

  • Happens year-round as needs arise
  • More time for preparation between rounds
  • Middle-market and growth equity focus
  • Direct outreach can work

On-Cycle PE Recruiting Timeline

On-cycle recruiting has moved earlier every year. Here's what to expect if you're starting as an IB analyst targeting PE.

Month

Month 1-3 of IB

Headhunters start reaching out to top performers

Month

Month 4-6

First-round interviews begin, often with 24-48 hour notice

Month

Month 6-8

Superdays and offers extended, often same-day decisions

Month

Month 9-12

Off-cycle recruiting for remaining spots

PE Technical Interview Topics

PE interviews focus heavily on LBO mechanics and your ability to think like an investor. Here are the core areas you need to master.

LBO Mechanics

  • Sources & uses of funds
  • Debt schedules and paydown
  • IRR and MOIC calculations
  • Value creation bridges

Paper LBO

  • 10-minute mental math framework
  • Quick IRR approximations
  • Key sensitivity drivers
  • Common shortcuts

Deal Discussion

  • Walk through a deal you worked on
  • What would you change about the deal?
  • How did you add value?
  • Key learnings

Investment Thesis

  • Industry analysis
  • Company positioning
  • Value creation plan
  • Risk factors and mitigants

Master PE Interviews

Our PE Recruiting Playbook covers everything from headhunter strategy to case study walkthroughs.

LBO Modeling Is Essential

You'll likely face a paper LBO in your interview. You need to be able to build one from scratch in 10-15 minutes with just pen and paper.

10 min

Paper LBO target time

20%+

Target IRR for most deals

2-3x

Typical MOIC expectations
